Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api

Class MceBroadcastReceiver

java.lang.Object
android.content.BroadcastReceiver
co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.MceBroadcastReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventBroadcastHandler
public abstract class MceBroadcastReceiver extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver implements EventBroadcastHandler
This class listens to SDK events and calls the relevant method when an event is detected. In order to handle the events, you have to override the events handling method.

  • Nested Class Summary
